                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>150</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 15.65em; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-17" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-18"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-20"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-22"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.902em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1001.46em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-23"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-24"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">150</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Random valid value নিয়ে প্রশ্ন আর 4 টা option test.</p>

<p><strong>বিকল্প:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>180</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="width: 31.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 26.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1026.11em, 2.379em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-103"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-105"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>A</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>180</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>A</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\sin{\left(A-{30}^o\right)}+\sin{\left\{{180}^o-\left({30}^o-A\right)\right\}}=\sin{(A-{30}^o)}+\sin{({30}^o-A)}=0</script></span></strong></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.8em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-274"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-276"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-277"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-281"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-283"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-288" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-290"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-291" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-292"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-294" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-295" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\frac{3}{4}\times\frac{1}{\sin{\theta}}-\frac{\sin{3\theta}}{4\sin^2{\theta}}=\frac{1}{\sin^2{\theta}}\left[\frac{3}{4}\sin{\theta}-\frac{1}{4}\sin{3\theta}\right]</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-296" style="width: 12.871em; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="width: 29.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1024.39em, 2.912em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-335"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\therefore\sin{\frac{\pi}{4}}+\sin{\frac{2\pi}{4}}+\sin{\frac{3\pi}{4}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt2}+1+\frac{1}{\sqrt2}=\frac{1+\sqrt2+1}{\sqrt2}=\frac{2+\sqrt2}{\sqrt2}=\sqrt2+1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন সম্পর্কটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-550"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.91em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">cot</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.233em; left: 0.959em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-552" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-553" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="padding-left: 0.184em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-555"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.187em; left: 0.321em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-566" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-567" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1007.93em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 7.926em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.775em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>β</mi></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>β</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>sec</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>3</mn><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\left(\tan{\beta}\sin{\beta}\right)-2\sin^2{\theta}=\frac{\sec^2{2\theta}-\tan^2{\theta}+\tan^2{2\theta}}{\tan^2{\theta}-\cot^2{3\beta}+cosec^23\beta}\ </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="width: 12.912em; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 1.027em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-765" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-766" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-767"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-768" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.83em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.83em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\cos{2\theta}=1-2\sin^2{\theta}=\frac{1-\tan^2{\theta}}{1+\tan^2{\theta}}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ত্রিভুজের পরিসীমা 22 একক, পরিবৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ 8 একক। ∠A=<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mn>30</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-769" style="width: 1.753em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1001.42em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-770"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-771"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mn>30</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">30^\circ </script></span>হলে sinB+sinC=?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>A</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>22</mn><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>8</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="width: 27.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1022.58em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-795"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-796"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.56em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-798"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-799" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-802"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-803" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.68em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-806" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-814" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-815" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.56em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-816"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-820"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.68em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-823" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.09em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.023em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-824"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-825" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-827" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-829" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1005.82em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.908em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-830"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-831" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-832" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-833" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-834"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-836" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-838" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-840"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-846"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-849" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1006.27em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -3.154em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-851"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-852" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-854" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-855"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-856"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-857"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-858"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-865"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-867" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-870" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-871"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>22</mn><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\frac{a}{\sin{A}}=\frac{b}{\sin{B}}=\frac{c}{\sin{C}}=\frac{a+b+c}{\sin{A}+\sin{B}+\sin{C}}=\frac{22}{\sin{{30}^o}+\sin{B}+\sin{C}}=2\times8</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>22</mn><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1.375</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.875</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="width: 34.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 28.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1028.57em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-878"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.289em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1005.17em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.58em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-882"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-883" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-884" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-885" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-886" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-887" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-888"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-889" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-890" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-891" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-892" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-894"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.29em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.289em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-902"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-903" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-904"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-905" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-908"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-910"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.375</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-915" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-916"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-917" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-918"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-919" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-922"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-923" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-924"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-925" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-927" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.875</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-929" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-930" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-931" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>22</mn><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1.375</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.875</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\Rightarrow\frac{22}{0.5+\sin{B}+\sin{C}}=16\Rightarrow0.5+\sin{B}+\sin{C}=1.375\therefore\sin{B}+\sin{C}=0.875=\frac{7}{8} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ত্রিভুজের পরিসীমা 25 একক, অন্তঃবৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ 3 একক। ত্রিভুজটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>37.5</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>25.6</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>40.5</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>55.85</p>
</label>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 130px; height: 117px;"></p>

clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="width: 3.802em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">∠</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>90</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\angle B={90}^o,\ b=8 </script></span>&nbsp;একক।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="width: 9.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.714em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1007.68em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1012"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1014"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1016"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1020"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1022"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\tan{A}+\tan{C}=4 </script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;হলে অপর বাহুদ্বয়ের গুণফল কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 97px;"></p>

height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-size: 50%; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1061"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.97em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1067" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1068" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1071"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1072" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1073" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1074" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1075" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1076" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mn>8</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\tan{A}+\tan{C}=4\Rightarrow\frac{a}{c}+\frac{c}{a}=4\Rightarrow\frac{a^2+c^2}{ca}=4\Rightarrow ca=\frac{8^2}{4}\therefore ca=16 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="width: 23.661em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.376em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1019.3em, 2.759em, -999.998em); top: -2.308em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1081"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1082"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1001.31em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1085"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1087"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1088"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>A এর valid কোনো মান বসিয়ে test কর।</p>

<p><strong>বিকল্প:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>120</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>120</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1146" style="width: 20.371em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.682em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1016.6em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1147"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1148"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1150" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1151"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1153"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1154"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;
