width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>⋅</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>120</mn></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">=\cos^2{\frac{A}{2}}+1+\frac{1}{2}\cdot2\cos{A}\cos{120}=\cos^2{\frac{A}{2}}-\frac{1}{2}\left(2\cos^2{\frac{A}{2}-1}\right)+1=\frac{1}{2}+1=\frac{3}{2}</script></span></strong></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1341"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1342" style="padding-left: 0.184em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1343"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1344" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\frac{3}{8}(\sin{A}+\sin{C})</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1346" style="width: 5.194em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="width: 3.008em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.42em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1363"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.093em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1366" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>N</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">None</script></span></p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>A</mi></mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="width: 17.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1014.72em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1369"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1370"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1373"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1375"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1380"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1382"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1383" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1385" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1387" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1388"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1390"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1395"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1396" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1397"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1398" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1400"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1401" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1402"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1403" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1405"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1406" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1407"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1408" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\sin^2{A}\sin^2{B}+\sin^2{C}=2\sin{A}\cos{B}\sin{C}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1409" style="width: 29.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1024.26em, 2.748em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1410"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1412" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1413" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1414" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1418"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1419" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1420"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1421" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1423"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1425"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1426" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1428"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1429" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1430"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1434"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1436"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.305em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.088em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1441"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.248em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1446"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1447" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1448" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.248em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1450" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1451"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1452" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.305em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1454" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1457" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1458" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1460" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1461" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1465" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1469" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1471" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\Rightarrow\frac{3}{8}=2\sin{A}\sin{C}\cos{B}\therefore\cos{B}=\frac{3}{16\sin{A}\sin{C}}=\frac{3}{16}cosec\ A\ cosec\ C</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1604" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.059em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 4.018em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 4.551em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.178em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>16</mn></mfrac></mrow></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mrow></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></msqrt></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">2\sin{\left(\frac{\pi}{16}\right)}=\sqrt{4\sin^2{\frac{\pi}{16}}}=\sqrt{2-2\cos{\frac{\pi}{8}}}=\sqrt{2-\sqrt{2\left(1+\cos{\frac{\pi}{4}}\right)}}=\sqrt{2-\sqrt{2+\sqrt2}}</script></span></p>

<p>or Use Calculator.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10 </span>

position: relative; width: 0.549em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.41em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.997em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mfrac><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>π</mo></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>–</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>θ</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mfrac><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>π</mo></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>–</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>θ</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\tan{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\theta\right)+\tan{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\theta\right)}=4}   \Rightarrow\frac{\sin{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\theta\right)}}{\cos{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\theta\right)}} 

+ \frac{sin (\frac{π}{4} – θ)}{cos(\frac{π}{4} – )θ} =4</script></span></p>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1845" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1846" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">θ</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1847" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2.2</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\Rightarrow\sin{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}-\theta\right)=2.2cos\ \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\theta\right)\cos{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\theta\right)}}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1888" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1899"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1900" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1901"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1902"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1903" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1907" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1910" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1911" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1913" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1914" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1915" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1916" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1917" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1918" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1919" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1920" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1922" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1923" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1924" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1927" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∈</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1929" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1930"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1931" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">Z</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1932" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.603em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>∈</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="double-struck">Z</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">\Rightarrow\sin{\frac{\pi}{2}=2}\ \left(\cos{\frac{\pi}{2}+cos2\theta}\right)=2\ cos2\theta \\
\Rightarrow cos2\theta=\frac{1}{2}=\cos{\frac{\pi}{3}}  \Rightarrow2\theta=2n\pi\pm\frac{\pi}{3}
\therefore\theta=n\pi\pm\frac{\pi}{6}\ [n\in\mathbb{Z}] 
</script></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1933" style="width: 17.774em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.57em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1014.5em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1934"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1935"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.312em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1937"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1938"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1939" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1955"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1956"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1957" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\cot^{-1}{(\tan{2x})}-\cot^{-1}{\left(\tan{3x}\right)}=?</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; padding-left: 0.166em;">cot</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2037"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2038" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2039"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2040"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2041" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2042"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2043"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2082" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2083" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2084" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2087" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2088" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2089" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>.</mo></mrow><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>.</mo></mrow><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\cot^{-1}{(\tan{2x})}-\cot^{-1}{\left(\tan{3x}\right)}\\
=\cot^{-1}{.}\cot{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2x\right)}-\cot^{-1}{.}\cot{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-3x\right)}
	=\frac{\pi}{2}-2x-\frac{\pi}{2}+3x=x
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="width: 4.556em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.736em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1003.74em, 2.689em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2127"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2129" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2130" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">±</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2160" style="width: 35.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 29.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1029.35em, 2.707em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2178"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2179" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2180"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2181" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2210" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2211" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2213" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.97em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2214"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2216"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.051em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2220" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2221"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2222" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2223" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2226" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2227" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.97em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2230"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2232"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.051em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2236" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2237"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2238" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2239" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\left(2sin\theta-1\right)\left(2\sin{\theta-\sqrt3}\right)=0\Rightarrow\sin{\theta=\frac{1}{2},\frac{\sqrt3}{2}}\ \therefore\theta\ =n\pi+\left(-1\right)^n\frac{\pi}{6},\ n\pi+\left(-1\right)^n\frac{\pi}{3}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2296" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2297" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2300" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1002.78em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 2.78em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2302" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.184em;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">∈</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2304" style="padding-left: 0.276em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2305"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2306" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">Z</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2478"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2479" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">Z</span></span></span><span style="display: xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><msup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mi>π</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>n</mi><mo>∈</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="double-struck">Z</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">cotx-tanx=2\ \Rightarrow\frac{cosx}{sinx}-\frac{sinx}{cosx}=2\Rightarrow \frac{cos^2\ x-sin^2x}{2sinx\ cosx}=1\Rightarrow\frac{cos2x}{sin\ 2x}=1\Rightarrow \frac{sin\ 2x}{cos2x}=1\\

	\therefore  tan2x=\tan{\frac{\pi}{4}}    \therefore  2x=\frac{\pi}{4}+n\pi\ \Rightarrow x=\frac{\left(\ 4n+1\right)}{8}\pi,\ n\in\mathbb{Z}
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2496" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.2em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.231em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2498"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2499"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2500" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em);                                     </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যদি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2533" style="width: 7.602em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.224em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1006.22em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2534"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2536"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2537" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2538"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2540" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2543"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2544" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2545"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2547" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\cos{3\theta}=\cos{2\theta}</script></span>&nbsp;হয় তবে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2548" style="width: 8.795em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.193em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1007.08em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2549"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2550" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">?</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">≤</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2556" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">≤</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2559" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\theta=?[0\le\theta\le2\pi]</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
