                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2612" style="width: 13.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1011.23em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2613"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2615"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2616" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2617"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2619" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2622"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2623" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2624"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2626" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2627" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2629" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2632" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2633" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2635" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2636" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>±</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\cos{3\theta}=\cos{2\theta}\therefore3\theta=2n\pi\pm2\theta</script></span></p>

<p>Considering +,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2637" style="width: 16.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1013.36em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2638"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2639" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2640" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2641" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2642" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2643" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2644" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2645" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2647" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2648" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2649" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2652" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2653" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2654" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2655" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2656" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2660" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">3\theta=2n\pi+2\theta\Rightarrow\theta=2n\pi\therefore\theta=0,2\pi</script></span></p>

<p>Considering –,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2661" style="width: 16.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1013.69em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2662"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2664" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2674" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2677" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2678" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2680" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2682" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.572em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2683"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2684" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2685" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2686" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.31em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">3\theta=2n\pi-2\theta\Rightarrow5\theta=2n\pi\Rightarrow\theta=\frac{2n\pi}{5}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2688" style="width: 11.027em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2720" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\therefore\theta=0,\frac{2\pi}{5},\frac{4\pi}{5},\frac{6\pi}{5},\frac{8\pi}{5},2\pi</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>o</mi><mi>r</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2789" style="width: 3.782em; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.549em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2795" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2796" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2798"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.55em, 1.186em, -999.998em); </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mo>.</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x221E;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2813" style="width: 29.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1024.14em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2814"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2815" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2825"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2826" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2827"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2828" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2833"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2834" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2835"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2836" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2837" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2844" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.22em, 4.182em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2849" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2851" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2852" style="font-size: 70.7%; top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2858"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2861" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∵</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2862" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2864" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2865" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2866"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2867" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2868" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2869" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>…</mo><mo>…</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>∵</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">1+sin\theta+\sin^2{\theta+\sin^3{\theta+.\ \ldots\ldots\infty=\frac{1}{1-sin\theta}=4+2\sqrt3}} [\because s=\frac{a}{1-r}]</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2871" style="width: 25.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1020.86em, 2.912em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2872"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2922"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2923" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2924" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\Rightarrow 1-\sin{\theta=\frac{1}{4+2\sqrt3}=1-\frac{\sqrt3}{2}} \Rightarrow  \sin{\theta=\frac{\sqrt3}{2}\ \ \ \therefore\theta=\frac{\pi}{3}},\frac{2\pi}{3}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <span>Question 17 </span>

                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>.</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2981" style="width: 33.076em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3143" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3145" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3146" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3147" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>.</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>.</mo></mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">=\tan^{-1}{\left\{sin.\sin^{-1}{\frac{1}{\sqrt3}}\right\}}=\tan^{-1}{\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt3}\right)}=\tan^{-1}{.}\tan{\frac{\pi}{6}}=\frac{\pi}{6}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.171em; left: 0.374em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3232" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1002.31em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 2.312em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">?</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.725em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\tan^{-1}{\frac{a^2-b^2}{1+a^2b^2}+\tan^{-1}{\frac{b^2-c^2}{1+b^2c^2}+\tan^{-1}{\frac{c^2-a^2}{1+c^2a^2}=}}}?</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>tan</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3261" style="width: 28.117em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3301" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3303" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (16)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.458em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3395"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3396"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3397" style="font-size: 70.7%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3465" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3466"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3467"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3468" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3469" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>g</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>9.72</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\frac{g_1}{g}=1-\frac{h}{R}\Rightarrow g_1=\left(1-\frac{h}{R}\right)g=\left(1-\frac{h}{R}\right)\frac{GM}{R^2}\ \Rightarrow g_1=9.72ms^{-2}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ভূ-পৃষ্ঠ হতে&nbsp;6000km&nbsp;উচ্চতায় একটি কৃত্রিম উপগ্রহ পৃথিবীকে কেন্দ্র করে কত বেগে ঘুরবে? [পৃথিবীর ব্যাসার্ধ&nbsp;6400km&nbsp;ও ভর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>24</mn></mrow></msup><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3470" style="width: 5.516em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.51em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3471"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3474" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.79em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3478"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3479"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3480" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5.68</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3519" style="width: 11.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.51em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3520"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3521"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3522" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3523" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3525" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3526"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3528" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.48em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3529"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3530" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3531" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3532" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.6em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3534" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5.68</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3537" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3538" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3539"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3540"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3542" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5.68</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">v^2=\frac{GM}{R+h}\Rightarrow v=5.68km/s</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বলকে ভূ-পৃষ্ঠের সাথে 60° কোণে উপরে ছুড়ে মারা হল। যদি এটি পৃথিবীতে ফিরে না আসে তাহলে এর আদিবেগ কত ছিল?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9.7</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3543" style="width: 4.465em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.645em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1003.6em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3544"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3546" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3547" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3548"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3549"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3550" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3551" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>9.7</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-129">9.7km/s</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>11.2</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3552" style="width: 5.057em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.146em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1004.1em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3553"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">11.2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3555" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3556" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3557"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3558"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3560" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>11.2</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-130">11.2km/s</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5.6</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3561" style="width: 4.465em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.645em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1003.6em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3562"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5.6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3564" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3565" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3566"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3567"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3569" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5.6</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-131">5.6km/s</script></span></p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>19.4</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3570" style="width: 5.057em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.146em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1004.1em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3571"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">19.4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3573" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3574" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3575"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3576"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3578" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>19.4</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-132">19.4km/s</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>আদিবেগ মুক্তিবেগের সমান হতে হবে। এটি কোণের উপর নির্ভর করে না।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কেপলারের সূত্র অনুযায়ী একটি উপগ্রহ যদি উপবৃত্তাকার পথে চলে তাহলে এর পর্যায়কাল কোন অক্ষের দৈর্ঘ্যের উপর নির্ভর করে না?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                            <span>Question 23 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>A ও B দুইটি বস্তুর ভর 8000kg ও 10000kg । A থেকে 100m ও B থেকে 250m দূরে একটি বিন্দুতে মহাকর্ষীয় প্রাবল্য কত হবে?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>G</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>G</mi></mrow><mn>25</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3698" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.994em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>G</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>G</mi></mrow><mn>25</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>≥</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>d</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>≤</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-136">E=\frac{GM}{r^2},\ \ E_1=\frac{4G}{5},\ E_2=\frac{4G}{25},\ \vec{E}={\vec{E}}_1+{\vec{E}}_2\therefore\left|\vec{E}\right|\geq E_1-E_2\ and\ \left|\vec{E}\right|\le E_1+E_2\ </script></span><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-137-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x2265;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi>G</mi></mrow><mn>25</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>d</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>24</mn><mi>G</mi></mrow><mn>25</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3700" style="width: 10.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.732em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1008.73em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3701"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3702" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3703" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≥</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3705" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3706"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3707" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3708" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">G</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3709" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3712" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3713" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3715" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≤</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3717" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3718"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3719" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3721" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>≥</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi>G</mi></mrow><mn>25</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>d</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>E</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>24</mn><mi>G</mi></mrow><mn>25</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-137">\therefore E\geq\frac{16G}{25}\ and\ E\le\frac{24G}{25}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অক্ষাংশের জন্য g এর মানের সর্বোচ্চ পরিবর্তন হবে–</p>
