                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>R</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3734" style="width: 8.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1006.76em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3735"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3736"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3737" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3738" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3740" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3742" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3743" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3744" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3745" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3746" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3747" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3748"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3749" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3750" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3751" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>R</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-141">g_1=g-\omega^2Rcos^2\theta;</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-142-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mi>d</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3753" style="width: 4.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.24em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3754"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3755" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3757" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3758" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3759" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3760" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3761" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px;                             </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 25 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি নিরেট গোলকের ভর&nbsp;1000kg&nbsp;ও ব্যাসার্ধ 5m&nbsp;। কেন্দ্র থেকে 2m&nbsp;দূরে বিভব কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-149-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>284</mn><mi>G</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3818" style="width: 11.846em; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3823"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3842" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3843" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.26em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.264em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3845" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">284</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3847" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">G</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>284</mn><mi>G</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-149">V=-\frac{GM\left(3a^2-r^2\right)}{2a^3}=-284G</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 26 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি কৃত্রিম উপগ্রহ পৃথিবী &nbsp;পৃষ্ঠের কাছ দিয়ে ঘুরছে। এটিকে অসীমে পাঠাতে হলে এর গতি বাড়াতে হবে-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পৃথিবী পৃষ্ঠের কাছ দিয়ে ঘুরলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-150-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3848" style="width: 4.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.36em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3849"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3850" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3852" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3855" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.27em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-150">v=\sqrt{gR}</script></span>&nbsp;; অসীমে পাঠাতে হলে অতিক্রান্ত বেগ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-151-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>e</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3856" style="width: 5.002em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3867" style="width: 0.658em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3868"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3869" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-152">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;গতি বাড়াতে হবে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt></mrow><msqrt><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>41.42</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mn>41</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3870" style="width: 16.723em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.18em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">41.42</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≈</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">41</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt></mrow><msqrt><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></msqrt></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>41.42</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>≈</mo><mn>41</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-153">=\frac{\sqrt{2gR}-\sqrt{gR}}{\sqrt{gR}}\times100\%=41.42\%\approx41\%</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 27 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর আহ্নিক গতির ক্ষেত্রে কৌণিক দ্রুতি কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-158-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mi>T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3.14</mn></mrow><mn>86400</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>7.3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3987" style="width: 16.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1013.12em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3988"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3989" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3991" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3992"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3993" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3994" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3995" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3997" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3998"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3999" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4000" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.72em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4002" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">86400</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7.3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4006" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4007"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4008"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4010"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4011"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4012" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4013" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4015" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4016" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4017" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4018"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4019" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4020"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4021"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4022" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4023" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3.14</mn></mrow><mn>86400</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>7.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-158">\omega=\frac{2\pi}{T}=\frac{2\times3.14}{86400}=7.3\times{10}^{-5}\ rads^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 28 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ক্রেনের সাহায্যে&nbsp;200&nbsp;kg&nbsp;ভরের একটি বস্তুকে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-159-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4024" style="width: 4.734em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.877em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.88em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4025"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4028" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4029"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.455em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.41em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4030" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.486em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4031"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4032"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4033" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4034" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-164-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>F</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>196</mn><mi>W</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4055" style="width: 21.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1017.62em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4056"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4057" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4059" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4060" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4062" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4063" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4065" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4067" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4069"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">200</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4074" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4075" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4076" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">196</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4079" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>F</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>196</mn><mi>W</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-164">P=Fv=mg\times v=\left(200\times9.8\times0.1\right)W=196W</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মুক্তভাবে পতনশীল বস্তুর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-165-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>K</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4080" style="width: 1.79em; h=\frac{n+x}{n+1} 
</script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>K</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4130" style="width: 22.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.609em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1018.61em, 6.314em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4131"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.609em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1014.76em, 4.387em, -999.998em); height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4190" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.42em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>K</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-170">E_K=nE_P\Rightarrow mgx=nmg\left(h-x\right)\\ \Rightarrow x=nh-nx\ \Rightarrow x=\frac{nh}{n+1}\ \Rightarrow h=\frac{\left(n+1\right)x}{n}  </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 30 </span>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4341" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4344" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4349" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1008.98em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: 0.453em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-4350" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4351" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4353" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">42</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4357" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.518em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -5.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>α</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>⋅</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mi>α</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mn>14</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>42</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-175">\vec{F}=\alpha\hat{i}+2\hat{j}+4\hat{k} \\ \vec{r}=\left(6-2\right)\hat{i}+\left(8-\alpha\right)\hat{j}+\left(3\alpha-4\right)\hat{k} \\ W=\vec{F}\cdot\vec{r}=4\alpha+16-2\alpha+12\alpha-16=14\alpha \\ \therefore14\alpha=42\Rightarrow\alpha=3 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মোট শক্তি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-176-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>80</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4360" style="width: 5.699em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4361"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4362" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4365" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>80</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-176">E=mg\times80</script></span>;&nbsp;অবশিষ্ট শক্তি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mi>E</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4368" style="width: 9.223em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4369"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4371" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4373"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.8</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4381" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mi>E</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-177">=\left(1-0.2\right)E=0.8E </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.8</mn><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>h</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>80</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>h</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi>h</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4382" style="width: 22.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1018.32em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4383"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.8</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4385" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4387" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4388" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4389"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4390" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4391" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4393" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4394" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">80</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4400" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4401" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4402"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4403" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4404" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4405" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4406" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4407" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4408" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">64</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4412" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.8</mn><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>h</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>80</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>h</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>h</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-178">0.8E=mgh^\prime\Rightarrow mg\times80\times0.8=mgh^\prime\therefore h^\prime=64\ m </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>h&nbsp;উচ্চতা হতে কোনো একটি বস্তুকে ছেড়ে দেওয়া হলো। প্রতিবার মাটিতে আঘাত করার ফলে বস্তুটি 50% করে বিভব শক্তি হারায়। বস্তু কর্তৃক অতিক্রান্ত মোট দূরত্ব কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4487" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.047em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mo>…</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mo>…</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>h</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-184">=h+2\ \left(\frac{h}{2}+\frac{h}{4}+\frac{h}{8}+\ldots\right)=h+\left(h+\frac{h}{2}+\frac{h}{4}+\ldots\right)=h+\frac{h}{1-\frac{1}{2}}=3h   </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 33 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ভূমি হতে উল্লম্বভাবে উপরে নিক্ষিপ্ত বস্তুর গতিশক্তি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4488" style="width: 2.424em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1001.87em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4489"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4491"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.78em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4492" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4493" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-185">(E_k) </script></span>&nbsp;বনাম সময় (t) এর সঠিক লেখচিত্র কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 92px;"></p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 99px;"></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>উপরে নিক্ষিপ্ত হলে প্রথমে বেগ কমবে এবং সর্বোচ্চ উচ্চতায় শূন্য হয়ে আবার নিচে পড়া শুরু করবে। তখন গতিশক্তি আবার বৃদ্ধি পাবে অর্থাৎ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-186-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4495" style="width: 5.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.59em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4496"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4497"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4498" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4499" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4501" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4502" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4503" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4505" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4506" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4507" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mo>∝</mo><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>∝</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-186">E_k\propto v^2\propto t^2</script></span>&nbsp;হবে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি মার্বেলকে সুতায় বেঁধে বৃত্তাকার পথে ঘুরালে পূর্ণ ঘূর্ণনে কাজের পরিমাণ হবে—</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

</label>

</label>

                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সুতার টান এবং সরণের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-187-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>90</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4508" style="width: 1.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.19em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4509"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4510"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4511"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4512"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4513" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">90</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4514" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>90</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-187">{90}^o </script></span>&nbsp;; তাই &nbsp;কাজ শুন্য।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
