                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (16)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি&nbsp;5% (w/v)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4515" style="width: 3.839em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.132em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.13em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4516"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4517"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.9em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4518" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4519" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4520" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4521"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4522" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4523" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">H_2SO_4</script></span>&nbsp;দ্রবণের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>25</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4524" style="width: 3.43em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.796em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.76em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4525"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4526" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4528" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4529" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>25</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-189">25\ mL </script></span>&nbsp;এর মধ্যে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-190-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4530" style="width: 4.063em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.318em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1003.28em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4531"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4534" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4535" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4576" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4577" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4578" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.102</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4581" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>98</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.102</mn><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-191">V_1S_1=V_2S_2\Rightarrow\left(\frac{5\times10}{98}\right)\times 25=\left(25+100\right)\times S_2 
\Rightarrow S_2=0.102M 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

বিক্রিয়াটির ক্ষেত্রে কোনটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-193-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4606" style="width: 3.008em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-197-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4654" style="width: 1.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.03em, 2.215em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-197">-2 </script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-198-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>P</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4658" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.5em, 2.256em, -999.998em); display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-199-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4666" style="width: 1.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.03em, 2.215em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-199">+6</script></span>&nbsp;তাই, PbS জারিত হয়েছে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 37 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সবল এসিড ও দুর্বল ক্ষারের টাইট্রেশনে নির্দেশকের হঠাৎ বর্ণ পরিবর্তনের&nbsp;pH&nbsp;পরিসর-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>8.0-10.0</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>4.0-10.0</p>
</label>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1.0-3.0</p>
</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>50 mL 1 M নাইট্রিক এসিড দ্রবণের মধ্যে 200 mL 0.2 g NaOH মিশ্রিত করা হলে মিশ্র দ্রবণের pH কত?</p>

200\ mL\ 0.2\ g\ NaOH=\frac{\frac{0.2}{40}}{0.2}=0.025\ M\equiv25\ mL\ 1M\ OH^- 
</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4734" style="width: 0.658em; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4751" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4752" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4756" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4757" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-202">H^+=\left(50-25\right)\ mL=25\ mL </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-203-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4758" style="width: 11.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1009.55em, 2.912em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4759"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4760" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4761" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4762" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4763"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4764" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4765" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4766" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-4768" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.994em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.56em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4769"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4770" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4771" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4772" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.79em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.432em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4773"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4774" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4775"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4776" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">200</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4777" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4778" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4779" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.994em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4783" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-203">\therefore\left[H^+\right]=\frac{25\times1}{\left(200+50\right)}=0.1\ M </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-204-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4784" style="width: 10.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1008.24em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4785"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4786" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4787" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4788" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4789" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4790" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4791" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4792" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4793" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4795" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4796" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4797"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4798" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4799" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4800" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-204">\therefore pH=-log\ \left[H^+\right]=1 </script></span></p>

<p>বিকল্প:</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-205-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>H</mi><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4862" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4863" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4864" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.11em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4868" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4869"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4870"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4872"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4873"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4874" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4875" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4877" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4878" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4879" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.387em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>H</mi><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mn>0.2</mn><mn>40</mn></mfrac><mn>0.2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-205">n_{HNO_3}=\left(50\times{10}^{-3}\times1\right)\ mol=50\times{10}^{-3}\ mol \\
n_{NaOH}=\frac{\frac{0.2}{40}}{0.2}=25\times{10}^{-3}\ mol 
</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-206-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>H</mi><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4880" style="width: 3.895em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-208-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>H</mi><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>250</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4926" style="width: 13.65em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>H</mi><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>250</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-208">\therefore\left[HNO_3\right]=\frac{25\times{10}^{-3}}{250\times{10}^{-3}}\therefore pH=1 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 39 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন বিক্রিয়ায়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-209-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4967" style="width: 3.02em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-212-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5026" style="width: 18.035em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>অপশন A, B ও C তে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-214-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mover><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mover></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5076" style="width: 2.461em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5270" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.08em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.084em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1013.57em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -0.449em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-5271" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5273" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.07em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5274" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5275"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5276"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5277" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5278" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5279" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5280"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5281" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5282" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-5284" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1003.4em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.719em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5285"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5286" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5287" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5288" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5289" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5290" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.05</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5291" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.527em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5295" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.781em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.848em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>M</mi><mi>n</mi><msubsup><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>O</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>K</mi><mi>M</mi><mi>n</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>K</mi><mi>M</mi><mi>n</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow><mn>25</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-227">MnO_4^-+5Fe^{2+}+8H^+\rightarrow5Fe^{3+}+Mn^{2+}+4H_2O \\
\Rightarrow\frac{V_{KMnO_4}\times M_{KMnO_4}}{1}=\frac{V_{FeSO_4}\times M_{FeSO_4}}{5} \\
\Rightarrow M_{FeSO_4}=\frac{5\times20\times0.05}{25}=0.2\ M 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-229-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.02</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>36.5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1020.9em, 6.027em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5306"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1014.72em, 4.387em, -999.998em); width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5313" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5315" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5317"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.02</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">36.5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5326"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5327"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5328" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5329" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5332" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5333" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5334"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.73</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5359"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5360"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5361" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.02</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>36.5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.73</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>730</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>730</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>p</mi><mi>p</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-229">0.02\ M\ HCl=\left(0.02\times36.5\right)\ gL^{-1} \\
=\left(0.73\times{10}^3\right)\ mgL^{-1}=730\ mgL^{-1}=730\ ppm 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>2.0&nbsp;gm&nbsp;ভেজালযুক্ত লৌহ টুকরাকে সম্পূর্ণরূপে প্রশমিত করতে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-233-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0.5</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5396" style="width: 11.924em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.763em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1009.76em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5397"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5400" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5401" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5404" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5406"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5410"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.896em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5413"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5414" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5415" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0.5</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-233">10\ mL\ 0.5M\ K_2Cr_2O_7 </script></span>&nbsp;দ্রবণ প্রয়োজন হয়। ঐ লৌহ টুকরায় ভেজালের শতকরা পরিমাণ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>বিশুদ্ধ লোহা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-234-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5416" style="width: 2.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.89em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5417"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5419" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-234">=W;</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-235-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mi>W</mi><mn>55.85</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6755</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5421" style="width: 19.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1016.03em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5422"><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-5425"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5426" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.56em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5427" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">55.85</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-5431" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5432" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5433" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5439" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.6755</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5442" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5443" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mi>W</mi><mn>55.85</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6755</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-235">\ \ \frac{W}{55.85}\times1=\frac{10}{1000}\times0.5\times6\Rightarrow W=1.6755gm </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-236-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5444" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5445"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5446" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-236">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;শতকরা ভেজাল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-237-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1.6755</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16.225</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5447" style="width: 12.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.494em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1010.45em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5448"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-5450" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.994em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.83em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.432em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5451"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5452" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5453" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5454" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.6755</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5455" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.994em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16.225</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1.6755</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16.225</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-237">=\frac{2-1.6755}{2}\times100\%=16.225\%</script></span></p>
</span>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>24 g বিশুদ্ধ চুনাপাথরের তাপীয় বিয়োজনে নির্গত&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-238-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5462" style="width: 2.386em; top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5463"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5464" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5465"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5466" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5467" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-238">CO_2 </script></span>&nbsp;কে সম্পূর্ণরূপে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-239-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5468" style="width: 4.659em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 9.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -8.997em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 9.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>O</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>≡</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>≡</mo><mn>80</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mn>24</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>≡</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>80</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>19.2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>S</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>n</mi><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>n</mi><mi>S</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mn>19.2</mn><mn>40</mn></mfrac><mn>0.8</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>600</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-241">CO_2+2NaOH\rightarrow Na_2CO_3+H_2O \\
\therefore1\ mol\ CaCO_3\equiv2\ mol\ NaOH \\
\Rightarrow100\ g\ CaCO_3\equiv80\ g\ NaOH \\
\therefore24\ g\ CaCO_3\equiv\frac{80\times24}{100}=19.2\ g\ NaOH \\
S=\frac{n}{V}\Rightarrow V=\frac{n}{S}=\left(\frac{\frac{19.2}{40}}{0.8}\right)=0.6\ L=600\ mL 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 47 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-242-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>r</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>N</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>6</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5631" style="width: 6.82em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.591em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.157em, 1005.59em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5632"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5633"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.591em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.132em, 1004.51em, 4.398em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5634"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5635" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5636"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5637" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5638" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5639"><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>
