                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-247-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5668" style="width: 12.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.58em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5669"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5670" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5674" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5676"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5684" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-247">
x+6\times\left(-1\right)=-3\Rightarrow x=+3 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 48 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-248-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>I</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>I</mi><msubsup><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5688" style="width: 5.665em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5689"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5690"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; padding-left: 0.263em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5694" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5695"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em);                                         <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 49 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>50 mL&nbsp;মোলার&nbsp;NaOH, 50 mL&nbsp;সেমিমোলার&nbsp;NaOH ও&nbsp;50mL&nbsp;ডেসিমোলার&nbsp;NaOH&nbsp;পাত্রে যোগ করে&nbsp;&nbsp;250 mL&nbsp;দ্রবণ প্রস্তুত করা হলো। দ্রবণে কত গ্রাম ক্ষার বিদ্যমান?</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>7.8 g</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.26em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.264em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5773" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.289em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mi>M</mi></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>M</mi></msub><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mi>M</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mn>250</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.32</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>M</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>S</mi><mi>M</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.32</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>250</mn></mrow><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3.2</mn><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-249">S_1V_1+S_2V_2+S_3V_3=S_MV_M \\
\Rightarrow S_M=\frac{50\times1+50\times0.5+50\times0.1}{250}=0.32\ M \\
\therefore W=\frac{SMV}{1000}=\frac{0.32\times40\times250}{1000}=3.2g 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 50 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>BOD পরীক্ষার জন্য একটি পুকুর থেকে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-250-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5774" style="width: 3.132em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.573em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.57em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5775"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5778" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5779"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.306em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-257-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12.11</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>p</mi><mi>p</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5844" style="width: 5.421em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.419em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1004.42em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5845"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12.11</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5848" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5849" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5850" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>12.11</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>p</mi><mi>p</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-257">
12.11\ ppm </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-258-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>8.25</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>p</mi><mi>p</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5851" style="width: 4.784em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.918em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1003.92em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5852"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8.25</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5855" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5856" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5857" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>8.25</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>p</mi><mi>p</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-258">
8.25\ ppm 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>আয়োডোমিতির সমীকরণ মতে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-259-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5858" style="width: 12.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.002em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1010em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5859"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5863" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5864" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5868" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5870" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5871"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5873" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5874"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5875" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5876" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5877"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5883" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5884" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>≡</mo><mn>8</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-259">1\ \ mL\ 1\ N\ Na_2S_2O_3\equiv8\ mg</script></span>&nbsp;দ্রবীভূত অক্সিজেন</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-260-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5885" style="width: 20.371em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.682em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1016.68em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5886"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5887" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5890" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5891" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.02</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5897" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5899" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5900"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5901" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5902" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5903"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5904" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5905" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5906"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5907" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5908" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.02</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5915" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5916" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5917" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>≡</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-260">	\therefore10\ mL\ \ 0.02\ \ N\ Na_2S_2O_3\equiv8\times10\times0.02\ mg </script></span>&nbsp;দ্রবীভূত অক্সিজেন</p>

<p>সুতরাং, অণুজীব যোগ করার পূর্বে&nbsp;50 mL পানিতে দ্রবীভূত অক্সিজেন&nbsp;1.6&nbsp;mg</p>

<p>আবার,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-261-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5918" style="width: 12.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1010.21em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5919"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5922" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5923" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5927" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5928" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5929" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5931" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5932"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5934" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5935"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5936" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5937" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5938"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5939" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5940" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5941" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5942" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5943" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5944" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5945" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>≡</mo><mn>8</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-261">1\ mL\ \ 1\ N\ \ Na_2S_2O_3\equiv8\ mg</script></span>&nbsp;দ্রবীভূত অক্সিজেন</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-262-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>6.2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0.01</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5946" style="width: 20.904em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-263-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5979" style="width: 0.658em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5980"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5981" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-264-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>0.496</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5982" style="width: 4.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.06em, 2.338em, -999.998em); vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>0.496</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-264">=0.496\ mg</script></span></p>

<p>সুতরাং,&nbsp;50&nbsp;mL&nbsp;পানি হতে হারানো অক্সিজেন&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-265-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.496</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>1.104</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5989" style="width: 13.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1011.36em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5990"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5992" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5994"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5995" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.496</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6000" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6001" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.496</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>1.104</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-265">=\left(1.6-0.496\right)\ mg\ =1.104\ mg</script></span></p>

<p>অর্থাৎ,&nbsp;50 mL নমুনা পানির&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-266-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.104</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6008" style="width: 7.625em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>B</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.104</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-266">BOD=1.104\ mg</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-267-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>1000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6018" style="width: 4.756em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6019"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6020" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-6022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6023" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6024" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>1000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-267">\therefore1000\ mL  </script></span>&nbsp;নমুনা পানির&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-268-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.104</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>22.08</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6025" style="width: 14.756em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1012.09em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6026"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6027" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6028" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6029" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6030" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-6031" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.57em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.801em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6032"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6033" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.104</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6034" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6035" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6036" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.69em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.691em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-6037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6038" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6039" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-6040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6042" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">22.08</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-6043" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6044" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6045" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>B</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.104</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>22.08</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-268">BOD=\frac{1.104\times1000}{50}\ mg\ =22.08\ mg</script></span></p>

<p>সুতরাং, নমুনা পানির BOD হচ্ছে 22. 08 &nbsp;ppm</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
